name: Nisheeth Vishnoi, Professor of Computer Science, Yale
research: My work spans various areas of Mathematics, Theoretical Computer Science, Optimization, and Artificial Intelligence, focusing on algorithmic fairness, privacy, and decision-making in algorithm-human interactions. I study bias and strategic behavior in selection systems and develop mathematical tools for efficient learning in diffusion models.
prospective_students: Several open positions in theoretical computer science, machine learning, optimization, and algorithmic fairness are available. Please contact directly if interested.
